|brand = ASUS |model = Lyra |submodelappend = yes |submodel = (MAP-AC2200) |revision = A3 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = 90IG04C0-BO0B30 |wlclass = AC22003R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, wireless system, mesh node |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-RTACBX00 |icid = 3568A-RTACBX00 |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ4019; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 716 <!-- 716 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND (UBI) |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR3 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- MHz --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16IP-DI; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8072; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 60:45:CB |oui = 60:45:CB
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;3.14;;
|exp_if_types = none
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, 256QAM, MU-MIMO, Bluetooth 4.0, LED, AiMesh, AiProtection, |addchip = 2.4GHz WLAN RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY2623L;;2; ,,, 5GHz WLAN RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;4; ,,, Single Chip Bluetooth 4.0 (UART/HCI);Atheros;AR3012-BL3D;;1; ,,, Bluetooth 4.0 Dual-Mode SoC;Microchip (ISSC);IS1678SM;;1; ,,, 9-Channel LED Lighting Driver;Texas Instruments;LP5523;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS_XX_AMAPS |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Pegatron |manuf_model = HiveSpot |manuf_rev = 1.02 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = LEDE Project, OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/21/2017 |estreldate = 04/30/2017 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16833320334 |asin = B073SGPY6M |asin_country = US |countrymanuf = China
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 400 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 400 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5.2
|rad3chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9886; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = U.FL |rad3txchains = 2 |rad3rxchains = 2 |rad3sstreams = 2 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad3ac = 867 |rad3n = 400 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5.8
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== <small>''Mesh Network - Seamless Coverage in Every Corner of Home''</small> :[https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra/ Product page] (Kit 3x) {{•}} {{SupportPage|vendor=ASUS|model = Lyra}}
*Web GUI: http://router.asus.com {{see also|ASUS MAP-AC2200|Pegatron}}
*[http://www.apkmirror.com/apk/asustek-computer-inc/asus-lyra/ ''ASUS Lyra app'' on '''APKMirror'''] :Android ASUS Lyra App v1.0.0.0.20 (32.12 MByte 2017/06/01) ::Compatibility Models: :*ASUS Lyra (MAP-AC2200) • 90IG04C0-BO0B30 (2-Pack) :*[[ASUS Lyra Mini]] (MAP-AC1300) • 90IG04B0-BO0B30 (2-Pack) :*[[ASUS Lyra Trio]] (MAP-AC1750) • 90IG04M0-BO3R20 (2-Pack) :*[[ASUS Lyra Voice]] (AC2200) • 90IG04N0-MA1G00 (1-Pack)
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33128-asus-lyra-home-wi-fi-system-reviewed ''ASUS Lyra Home Wi-Fi System Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.digitalcitizen.life/reviewing-asus-lyra-ac2200-mesh ''Reviewing the ASUS Lyra AC2200'' on '''DigitalCitizen'''] :F/W Ver.: 3.0.0.4_382_10522 H/W Ver.: A3 :OUI: 60:45:CB ([http://www.digitalcitizen.life/sites/default/files/gdrive/asus_lyra_ac2200/asus_lyra_ac2200_6.png sticker image])
===Forum threads=== *[http://forums.hardwarezone.com.sg/107730138-post7.html On '''HardwareZone''' forums] (Maylyn's post) *[http://wl500g.info/entry.php?10135-ASUS-Blue-Cave-amp-Lyra On '''wl500g.info''' forums] (Omega's blog) *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/2076-asus-lyra-mesh-wifi/ On '''OpenITforum''' forums] (House's posts)
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_lyra_map-ac2200 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/asus/lyra_map-ac2200 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ipq40xx |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a7_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 19.07.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==Notes== <small> *'''Banish Wi-Fi Dead Spots''' – Tri-band, tri-node system delivers :perfect Wi-Fi coverage to every corner of your home. *'''Smart Antenna Design''' – Connections between nodes are :automatically optimized to deliver fastest speeds. *'''Smooth Connections, Always''' – As you move around your home, :always be automatically connected to the best possible signal. *'''Commercial-grade Security''' - AiProtection blocks security threats :to protect all devices on your home network. *'''You’re in Control''' – ''ASUS Lyra app'' allows no-fuss setup, lets manage :bandwidth and informs you instantly about any technical problems. *'''Family Overview''' – The feature lets you easily view and control each :family members’ internet and app usage from your mobile device. </small>
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Qualcomm]] [https://www.qualcomm.com/products/ipq4019 IPQ4019] @717 MHz Quad Core Processor *Wireless Standard: 802.11bgn (2.4 GHz), 802.11an/ac (5 GHz) *Wireless Speed: 400Mbps for 2.4 GHz, 2x 867Mbps for 5 GHz *Wireless Security: WPA/WPA2, WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK *Features: Wave2, MU-MIMO, Guest Wi-Fi, WPS, WMM :Adaptive QoS, AiProtection, Parental Control, IPv6 *Antenna: 7x internal antennas *Ports: 1x WAN GbE, 1x LAN GbE *Operation Mode: Router, Access point *Dimensions: (150mm Dia x 50mm H) :150mm x 150mm x 50mm (LxWxH) (without bezel) *Power: DC 12V/2A adapter
*Bluetooth: [[Atheros]] AR3012 ([https://wikidevi.com/files/Atheros/specsheets/AR3012.pdf Datasheet]) :''Microchip'' [http://www.issc.com.tw/products/data/content475d.html?id=71 BM79BLEDKMC2] Module
==See also== *[[ASUS Blue Cave]] - ''AC2600 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Blue-Cave/ PPage] :128MB Flash, 512MB RAM, [[Intel]] Wi-Fi, IFTTT, IoT • [https://www.engadget.com/2017/05/29/asus-blue-cave-wireless-router/ Computex 2017] *ASUS Lyra - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (2T2R 802.11abgn/ac) + QCA9886 (2T2R 5GHz) :*[[ASUS HiveSpot]] - ''AC2200 Multi-Point Wi-Fi System'' • CES 2017 *[[ASUS Lyra Mini]] - ''AC1300 Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra-Mini/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 @717MHz Quad Core (2T2R 802.11abgn/ac) :*[[ASUS HiveDot]] - ''AC1300 Multi-Point Wi-Fi System'' • CES 2017 *[[ASUS Lyra Trio]] - ''AC1750 Dual Band Mesh Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33179-asus-expands-lyra-mesh-family CES 2018] *[[ASUS Lyra Voice]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Mesh Router with Smart Speaker''
